item.title: Twitter Economics
item.description: Oppose - genuinely - fighting the ridiculously large bot/spam network. Ad/Marketing model: charge for followers.

item.title: Social Networks üö´ Tools & Productivity ‚úÖ
item.description: Recently I decided it was time to not only take a break but instead fully departure social networks. This is a process that started years ago when I first got rid of other social media services, even though it was only completed when the last standing social network profile came to an end: The time has come for my last social network presence (Twitter) to come to an end. Stay safe out there and feel free to reach out to me at tiago @3CORESec ‚úâÔ∏è
